org.taverna.server.master.factories

Interface ListenerFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRemoteRunFactory, ForkRunFactory, IdAwareForkRunFactory

    public interface ListenerFactory
    How to make event listeners of various types that are attached to a workflow instance.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<String> getSupportedListenerTypes()
      What types of listener are supported? Note that we assume that the list of types is the same for all users and all workflow instances.
      Listener makeListener(TavernaRun run, String listenerType, String configuration)
      Make an event listener.

    • Method Detail

      • makeListener

        Listener makeListener(TavernaRun run,
                      String listenerType,
                      String configuration)
               throws NoListenerException
        Make an event listener.
        Parameters:
        run - The workflow instance to attach the event listener to.
        listenerType - The type of event listener to create. Must be one of the strings returned by getSupportedListenerTypes().
        configuration - A configuration document to pass to the listener.
        Returns:
        The event listener that was created.
        Throws:
        NoListenerException - If the listenerType is unrecognized or the configuration is bad in some way.

      • getSupportedListenerTypes

        List<String> getSupportedListenerTypes()
        What types of listener are supported? Note that we assume that the list of types is the same for all users and all workflow instances.
        Returns:
        A list of supported listener types.
